summary: Present users with confirmation of completed actions, next steps, and relevant information following form submission or task completion

serviceContext.useCase: Confirm successful completion of user actions and provide clear guidance on what happens next, ensuring users understand the outcome of their submission
governmentServiceFlows: When citizens complete applications, registrations, or service requests
When workers finish processing cases or completing administrative tasks
When users submit forms that require processing or approval
When providing confirmation and next steps after successful form submission

components.purpose: Organize result page documentation into code examples and design guidelines
Provide tabbed interface for accessing different aspects of result page guidance
Present structured text content with consistent typography and spacing

keyPatterns: Clear confirmation messaging about completed actions
Next steps information with specific timelines
Reference number display for tracking purposes
Links to relevant services and resources
Contact information for support or follow-up
accessibility: Clear heading structure for screen reader navigation
Descriptive link text for all actions
Logical content flow from confirmation to next steps
Contact information clearly labeled and accessible
